paper_abstract: This short paper is devoted to study the law (mu -> sigma).lambda <= mu -> sigma.lambda, with fuzzy sets mu, sigma, and lambda, in the case the conditional -> is functionally expressible by a numerical function J, and the intersection . is functionally expressible by a continuous t-norm T. That is, it deals with the functional inequality T(J(a, b), c) <= J(a, T(b, c)) in the unknowns T and J.
paper_title: SHORT NOTE: ON A CONDITIONAL-CONJUNCTIVE LAW WITH FUZZY SETS
